ExampleDefinition.Description:
The 3D Bubble chart demo shows how to use [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.XyzDataSeries3D%603.html']XyzDataSeries3D[/url] and the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.RenderableSeries.ScatterRenderableSeries3D.html']ScatterRenderableSeries3D[/url] to render 3d bubbles.
Bubbles can be colored individually, programmatically selected and scaled using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.PointMetadata3D.html']PointMetadata3D[/url] class. PointMetadata also allows you to tag individual bubbles with a business object of any type.
